trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> to declaratively define data controls that it manages.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" />，以宣告方式定義它管理的資料控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup from a Dynamic Data page template that connects the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示標記的來源連接的動態資料頁範本<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Some markup is removed for clarity.
trans-unit.target: 為了清楚起見，會移除某些標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the data-bound control that is managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> 控制項管理的資料繫結控制項識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the data-bound control that is managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> 控制項管理的資料繫結控制項識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the markup from a Dynamic Data page template that connects the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager> control to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示標記的來源連接的動態資料頁範本<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Some markup is removed for clarity.
trans-unit.target: 為了清楚起見，會移除某些標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> control that contains the data control.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含資料控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> control that contains the data control.
trans-unit.target: 包含資料控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataManager" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the literal string <c>DataControl</c><c>:</c> that has the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference.ControlID" /> control appended to it.
trans-unit.target: 取得附加 <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference.ControlID" /> 控制項值的常值字串 <c>DataControl</c><c>:</c>。

trans-unit.source: The literal string <c>DataControl:</c> that has the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference.ControlID" /> property appended to it.
trans-unit.target: 附加 <see cref="P:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference.ControlID" /> 屬性值的常值字串 <c>DataControl:</c>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference.ControlID%2A> property is empty or `null`, the literal string `DataControl` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.DataControlReference.ControlID%2A>屬性是空的或`null`，常值字串`DataControl`傳回。
